column5: I have a private bedroom & shared bath upstairs in my townhouse that is perfect for the professional who travels & craves a homey atmosphere or if you're moving to the DFW area, here for an internship or just looking for a place that's comfortable. The neighborhood is small & quiet and if you're here for a long stay, the neighbors will make you one of their own. The space is full of amenities, including pool, workout room, washer/dryer, internet & kitchen.
column8: Perfect for the Business Traveler or Intern
